eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
ds^2 &=& -\left(-M+\frac{r^2}{l^2}+ \frac{J^2}{4 r^2}\right) dt^2
+ \left(-M+\frac{r^2}{l^2}+ \frac{J^2}{4 r^2}\right)^{-1} dr^2
\nonumber \\ & &
+ r^2 \left(d \phi - \frac{J}{2 r^2} dt\right)^2
\label{genmet}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
e^0 &=& -f dt \nonumber \\
e^1 &=& f^{-1} dr \nonumber \\
e^2 &=& r d \phi - \frac{J}{2r} dt
\

\begin{eqnarray}
T_0 &=& \frac{1}{2} (-i) \sigma_2 \nonumber \\
T_1 &=& \frac{1}{2} \sigma_3 \nonumber \\
T_2 &=& \frac{1}{2} \sigma_1 \nonumber \\
{[}T_a, T_b {]} &=& {f_{ab}}^{c} T_c
\nonumber \\
Tr(T_a T_b) &=& \frac{1}{2} \eta_{ab} \nonumber \\
\eta_{ab} &=& (-1,+1,+1) =\frac{1}{2} {f^{c}}_{ad} {f^{d}}_{bc}\nonumber \\
f_{012} &=& \epsilon_{012} =1 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
Tr (e^{-i m \cos \theta T}) 
&=& \sum_{w=-\infty}^{+\infty} \int^{1}_{-1} d \eta_0 e^{2 \pi i (m \eta_0+ \alpha)  w - i m \eta_0 T}.
\
